placeDesc: Known as Feengrotten in German, the Saalfeld Fairy Grottoes are colorful caves full of stalactites and stalagmites. Once a slate mining pit known as Jeremias luck, the beautiful grottoes were declared the “most colorful grottoes of the world” by the Guinness Book of Records.
placeShortDesc: "The most colorful grottoes of the world.
placeNearby: Oberweissbacher Bergbahn,East German Bunker Museum,Kika Figures of Erfurt
placeRelatedPlaces: Lacy's Caves,Caves of Filopappou Hill,Ice Cave of Bixby State Preserve,Corviano
